salmon: Apple cider vinegar or lemon juice
carbonara: 11/2 cups parmesan cheese freshly grated, plus more for garnish
tiramisu: 1 and 1/4 cups very strongly prepared espresso, warm or room temperature
16 ounces mascarpone, cold or at room temperature
2 cups heavy crream or heavy whipping cream
unsweetened natural or dutch-process cocoa powder
pie: 8 medium apples, peeled, cored and sliced
soup: 1 tablespoon thyme dry, 1 tablespoon if using fresh
1 tablespoon oregano fresh, chopped, 1tablespoon if using dry
4 cups chicken broth no sodium added
2 lbs chicken with skin and bones, use at least 1 chicken breast
paella: 4 chicken thighs boneless and akinless cut into 1 inch pieces
2 chorizo sausages cut into 1 inch pieces
4 cups vegetable or chicken broth low sodium
1 tbsp hot sauce such as Tabasco or Sriracha
1 lb large shrimp shelled and deveined but keep tails on
pancake: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted or vegetable oil
assorted toppings, such as butter, maple syrup, honey, jam, sweetened whipped cream or chocolate syrup
